chapter.title: Testing
chapter.para: To run the unit tests for a particular program, invoke the program with the UNITTEST variable set to the value Y. In this case, the program will stop running after executing the unit tests.

The integration tests span across programs. They test the system as a whole. To run the integration tests, invoke hivemind.bash with the INTEGRATIONTEST variable set to the value Y. In this case, Hivemind will stop running after executing the integration tests.
